name: Spaghetti
instructions: Defrost chicken overnight in the fridge
Shake the korma sauce
Cut the 3 garlic, 1 small onion, 2 potatoes, chicken fillets into half (try to get 9/12 chicken fillet pieces after cutting)
Wash the potatoes and chicken fillet
Add 2 tsp oil in pan, put on high heat
Saute garlic then saute onion
Change to medium heat
Add chicken pieces and potato
Add 1/2 tsp ground black pepper, Add the korma sauce,  1/3 ladle fish sauce ladle,  1/2 tablespoon salt
Stir everything together
close lid simmer for 20 minutes (stir every 10 minutes)
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Suscipit, ut?

name: Fried Battered Chicken
instructions: fill pan with oil until 1/4 full
Add the self raising flour, salt, ground black pepper, ginisa and salt into a bowl
In another bowl add the egg and mix
Cut the chicken into how many pieces you want
Mix the chicken into the egg bowl and coat generously
Now mix the chicken into the other bowl and coat generously
Repeat step 6 & 7 for a thicker crust
set pan to high heat
Once hot enough put chicken into the pan
Periodicially flip the chicken until golden brown

name: lemonade
instructions: Squeeze the lemonade into a cup
Add some ice from the freezer

name: Iced Water
instructions: Pour tap water into a cup
Add some ice from the freezer
